```{r}
library(raster)
library(rgdal)
```

# DEM Data
```{r}
x <- raster("../data/DEMFieldAK/N62W142_FABDEM_V1-0.tif")
```

```{r}
x
```

# Save DEM as SAGA grd
```{r}
writeRaster(x, file = "../outputs/dem1.asc", format="ascii")
```



```{r}
dem <- raster("../outputs/dem.asc")
```

```{r}
dem
```
```{r}
dem1 <- raster("../outputs/dem1.asc")
```
```{r}
dem1
```
